text:
Dear Mr,
The Network Acceptance Committee of NAEB is pleased
inform you that your program series
---- has been approved by them for distribution.
The committee has so informed the tape network manager
who will notify you in which release the series will be
included. He will also request from you master tapes
for the entire series,
'.Ve wish to thank you for your excellent cooperation
in submitting tapes and information concerning the series.
Cordially yours.
VYA/sw
Waldo Abbot, Chairman
Network Acceptance Committee
